name: Mathematics
description: Study of numbers, shapes, and patterns.

name: Natural Sciences
description: Study of natural phenomena and the physical world.

name: Language and Literature
description: Study of language and literary works.

name: History
description: Study of historical events and processes.

name: Physical Education
description: Development of physical skills and knowledge about health.

name: Geography
description: Study of the Earth's surface and its characteristics.

name: Art
description: Exploration of various forms of artistic expression.

name: Music
description: Study of musical theory and practice.

name: Chemistry
description: Study of the composition and properties of matter.

name: Biology
description: Study of living organisms and their life processes.

name: Physics
description: Study of the properties and behavior of matter and energy.

name: Computer Science
description: Study of computing systems and data processing.
